Text saved: People from different places can act in different ways. It is good to know this. It helps us talk to people better.

But we must be careful about stereotypes. Stereotypes are simple ideas about a group of people. These ideas are often not true. Using stereotypes is bad for making good relationships at work.

The culture of a country can change how we think and act. But many other things are also important. The part of the country we are from is important. The people we know are important. Our age is important. If we are a man or a woman is important. The culture at our job is important too. And the things that happen in our life are important.

So, we should remember that people can be different. But we should not think that all people from one country are the same.
